entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 70 gusting to 100 early this afternoon then becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
